author: Crandall Jones
text: Does anyone know of a best and worst practices document or case studies in establishing a stormwater utility fee ordinance?  I'm particularly interested in challenges with the basis (engineering estimates versus digitized data, etc) for establishing the parcel fees and what is and is not legally defensible.  We arte a population of approximately 45,000.
title: Establishing a Stormwater Utility Fee Ordinance
